column4: Could anyone give me advice on a broken apt-get install   http://pastebin.ca/1906594
I wasn't using screen and the network died over ssh.
So far I tried purging  http://pastebin.ca/1906595
which failed miserably
can still ssh in ?
yeah well I restarted the box
obviously,  sudo dpkg --configure -a
sudo dpkg --configure -a didn't change the status
sudo apt-get update               <<does this throw errors ?
still downloading but not throwing errors
so that will have done it prbly, else it shouldN't have started at all, can verify by again : sudo apt-get install lvm2
sudo apt-get upgrade is your next friend
update not so usefull lvm2 is already the newest version.
no, that's just what we wanted to achieeve, dpkg has worked then , all fine
http://pastebin.ca/1906603
sudo apt-get upgrade is your next friend
really
ah, wait...
sudo apt-get remove --purge lvm2 && sudo apt-get install lvm2
thats what i've allready done just one at a time
sudo apt-get clean
deleting d/l packages from apt's cache
&& statement still fails after clean
thanks for you help all the same
